head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ENTELIS, ELINOR CLAIRE,

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ENTELIS, ELINOR CLAIRE,

block.p: ENTELIS-Elinor Claire, on June 16, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Lester. Devoted mother of Franne, Pamela and Charles, and mother-in-law of George, Henry and Amy. Cherished grandmother of Adam, Rebecca, Heather, Brian, Luke and Dylan. Dearest sister of Audrey Rodgers and Alan Tropauer. Services Sunday, 10AM, at ''Riverside-Nassau North Chapels'', 55 North Station Plaza (opp. LIRR), Great Neck, NY.

ENTELIS-Elinor Claire, on June 16, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Lester. Devoted mother of Franne, Pamela and Charles, and mother-in-law of George, Henry and Amy.
